perturbation.original_text: Within 30 days of the end of each quarter during the term of this agreement, PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT shall receive from THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, a detailed accounting statement showing Net Due and Paid Shared Revenues for that quarter and shall remit to PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT its share of such revenues.
perturbation.changed_text:
Within 30 days of the end of each quarter during the term of this agreement, PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT shall receive from THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, a detailed accounting statement showing Net Due and Paid Shared Revenues for that quarter and shall remit to PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT its share of such revenues.

Notwithstanding the foregoing, all payments due to PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT must be remitted within 15 days of the end of each quarter.
perturbation.explanation: The added sentence contradicts the original 30-day payment term, creating an ambiguity. It is now unclear whether THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION has 30 days or only 15 days to remit payment, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: TERMINATION FOR CAUSE: Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Agreement may be terminated by either party immediately upon notice if the other party: (w) becomes insolvent; (x) files a petition in bankruptcy; (y) makes an assignment for the benefit of its creditors; or (z) breach any of its obligations under this Agreement in any material respect, which breach is not remedied within thirty (30) days following written notice to such party.
perturbation.changed_text: TERMINATION FOR CAUSE: Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Agreement may be terminated by either party immediately upon notice if the other party: (w) becomes insolvent; (x) files a petition in bankruptcy; (y) makes an assignment for the benefit of its creditors; or (z) breach any of its obligations under this Agreement in any material respect, which breach is not remedied within fifteen (15) days following written notice to such party.
perturbation.explanation: The changed text alters the cure period for a breach of contract from thirty (30) days to fifteen (15) days. This directly conflicts with the original clause, creating uncertainty about the applicable cure period and potentially leading to premature termination disputes.

perturbation.original_text: "Affiliates" shall mean any company or any other entity worldwide, including, without limitation, corporations, partnerships, joint ventures, and Limited Liability Companies, in which THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION owns at least a five percent ownership, equity, or financial interest.
perturbation.changed_text: "Affiliates" shall mean any company or any other entity worldwide, including, without limitation, corporations, partnerships, joint ventures, and Limited Liability Companies, in which THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION owns at least a fifty percent ownership, equity, or financial interest.
perturbation.explanation: The changed text alters the ownership percentage required to qualify as an "Affiliate" from five percent to fifty percent. This directly conflicts with the original definition. This creates an in-text contradiction about which entities are considered "Affiliates" under the agreement, impacting various rights and obligations associated with affiliate status, e.g., indemnification.
